title: FxLite - Simple Currency Coverter
desc: FxLite is a sleek currency converter that lets users quickly convert amounts between different currencies with live exchange rates. Featuring a responsive design with intuitive dropdowns, country flags, and real-time calculations, it ensures an easy and visually appealing experience for global users.

title: Climzo
desc: Climzo is a modern weather forecast app that lets users check real-time temperature, weather conditions, and sunrise or sunset times for any city. Built with Tailwind CSS and JavaScript, it provides a visually appealing, responsive interface with accurate and easy-to-read information.

title: EZ News
desc: This News App fetches the latest articles from various categories like sports, finance, and education, allowing users to search and explore trending topics easily. Built with modern JavaScript and Tailwind CSS, it delivers a responsive and interactive reading experience across devices.
